title: The Lords Could Be Masters (with Lord Oates)
itunes:title: The Lords Could Be Masters (with Lord Oates)
description:
Boris Johnson has agreed to give the MPs a veto on breaking the Brexit divorce agreement.

Will it be enough to placate the House of Lords? Liberal Democrat peer Jonathan Oates tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing why it's probably a no.

And, the prime minister's concession may have been a political climbdown, but was it a legal one? Craig Prescott, lecturer in law at Bangor University, joins to discuss.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Boris Johnson has agreed to give the MPs a veto on breaking the Brexit divorce agreement.

Will it be enough to placate the House of Lords? Liberal Democrat peer Jonathan Oates tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing why it's probably a no.

And, the prime minister's concession may have been a political climbdown, but was it a legal one? Craig Prescott, lecturer in law at Bangor University, joins to discuss.

itunes:author: Bloomberg
